report.title: The Truth Revealed (Quick Description)
report.author: AnotherBrick
report.bodytext: I am really sorry that I haven't taken the time to write a full report but I made a breakthrough recently that I want everyone to be aware of. Rectal administration, though degrading, is the absolute best way to injest this substance. Not only does it hit me in less than ten minutes, but there is no bad effects (such as nausea) that are associated with other methods of injestion. /n /n At this dosage I still had slight visuals up to 13 hours later. This is the only worthwhile way to injest this chemical, the come-up is slightly scary (fast, almost too fast) but worth it in the long run. The visuals are beyond description, and the feelings are amazing. I hope this will help many people, and will prove that 5-meo-amt is a worthwhile substance.
